entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: Slytherin is one of the founders of Hogwarts. He believed in keeping magical learning within all-magic families and disliked students with Muggle parentage.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is one of the founders of Hogwarts. He had a serious argument with Slytherin about admitting students from Muggle families.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Not mentioned in this text, but implied as the 'true heir' of Slytherin according to the legend of the Chamber of Secrets

entities.name: binns
entities.description: Professor Binns is a teacher at Hogwarts who is discussing the history of the school.

relationships.description: Slytherin and Gryffindor had a serious argument about admitting students from Muggle families.
According to the legend, Slytherin sealed the Chamber of Secrets and only his true heir would be able to unseal it.
Slytherin built a hidden chamber in the castle, according to the legend.
